TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Tamalon, title = Tamalon, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tamalon} }

S.FORM: Tamalon Itiniay i Datong Cen no Yilan ko Tamalon a niyaro', 90 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 277 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 13 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 37 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 87 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 240 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal11 , Amis1 , Rukai1 .
